lines.text: They offered me 4X or Toyota. With 4X I get a free Toyota. But with Toyota, I gotta buy my own beer!
Who died and made you Darth Vader?
Fine! I'll double it. Another five grand.

[to Edison]
Hey, next time don't be bullshiting me with the vodka.
Hey, do you mind if I use that stick?
The one that's up your butt!
You can get a lot of suckers to do this shit. I come all the way down to impress Bruce in front of daddy. I didn't come here to be insulted by these bigoted assholes!
